actions.committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Education and Labor.

official_title: A bill to require the Secretary of the Interior to revise the health and safety standards affecting anthracite mines, and to suspend enforcement of the Federal Coal Mine Health and Safety Act of 1969 until he has completed such revision.

summary.text: Requires the Secretary of the Interior to revise the health and safety standards affecting anthracite mines, and to suspend enforcement of the Federal Coal Mine Health and Safety Act of 1969 until he has completed such revision.

titles.title: A bill to require the Secretary of the Interior to revise the health and safety standards affecting anthracite mines, and to suspend enforcement of the Federal Coal Mine Health and Safety Act of 1969 until he has completed such revision.
